Azure: Inferno? Will you calm down now?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> TRoopers::
> 
> The troopers looked to their leader, whose did an movment with his
and everyone dropped their weapons. But they keep an eye in Inferno

> 
> 
>   Azure decided to step in at that moment. He climbed on top of Hydras.
> 
>   Azure: STOP, YOU UNDERAVERAGE GOONS! AND YOU TOO, YOU MAD ANT!
> 
>   He took out two frost grenades and held them.
> 
>   Azure: I don't quite care because I can withstand the cold. I know you
>   can't. So unless you want to end up frozen you gigacycles, I suggest
>   you all drop the guns so we can talk nicely.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
>   > Inferno gritted his teeth as he complicated his chances of 
>   > overcoming this. He know he couldn't stand the through of the 
>   > royalty becoming brainwashed by the enemy.  Inferno dropped the gun 
>   > in his right hand as to fake that he was considering surrender, but 
>   > in a flash he fired an energy blast from the  gun in his left hand 
>   > at the troop leader's gun then fired of his rocket thruster and 
>   > launched himself at the leader to body slam him.
>   >
